title: Kai Xiang Lim
text:
Hi! I am a senior data scientist working on real-world data in the pharmaceutical and healthcare sector.
I mainly use this website to document my learning journey as a data scientist. It consists of topics such as causal inference, machine learning, visualisation and coding tips!
I code in R, SQL and Python mainly. My native language is R.

title: Kai Xiang Lim
text:
Education
PhD in Statistical Genetics  King’s College London | 2019 - 2023
You can read my PhD thesis here.
MSc GED PP  King’s College London | 2017 - 2018
I moved south of Thames and was based at the Social, Genetics and Developmental Psychiatry (SGDP) centre to begin my academic journey. The full name of the “MSc GED PP” course was a mouthful – it stands for “Genes, Environment and Development in Psychology and Psychiatry”!
BSc Psychology, University College London  University College London | 2014 - 2017

title: Kai Xiang Lim
text:
Experience
Senior Data Scientist, Novo Nordisk  London, UK | September 2024 - present
Analytical Data Scientist, Roche  Welwyn Garden City, UK | 2023 - 2024
